section.title: Use the VNC console
section.para: To interact through the VNC console, you can use a VNC client directly, a special Java client, or a web browser. For information about how to configure the console, see .

section.title: Get an access URL
section.para: The Compute service enables you to create access_urls through the os-consoles extension. Support for accessing this URL is provided by the nova client:
Specify 'novnc' to get a URL suitable for pasting into a web browser.
Specify 'xvpvnc' for a URL suitable for pasting into the Java client.
